summary: Website for Talentblaze, a fractional talent acquisition service firm catering to startups in India and global firms setting up operations in India
architectural_notes: Website for talent acquisition service firm
Target audience: Indian startups and global firms entering India
Business model: Fractional talent acquisition services
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Professional hero background image showing diverse business professionals collaborating in modern office setting (hero-bg.dim_1920x800.png)
- Talentblaze logo design with modern, professional aesthetic suitable for B2B services (talentblaze-logo.dim_400x120.png)

existing_features.title: Create a homepage with hero section introducing Talentblaze as a fractional talent acquisition service firm for startups in India and global firms establishing operations in India
Create an About section explaining the fractional talent acquisition model and how Talentblaze serves its target markets
Create a Services section outlining key talent acquisition offerings relevant to Indian startups and global firms entering India
Create a Contact section with a contact form for potential clients to reach Talentblaze

Apply a professional, modern visual theme with warm, trustworthy colors (avoiding blue and purple), clean typography suitable for a B2B service brand, and cohesive spacing and layout patterns throughout all sections

new_feature_requests.summary: Create website for Talentblaze talent acquisition service
Implement backend storage for contact form submissions with fields for name, email, company name, and inquiry message
